document.full_text: vice president joe biden and top lawmakers faced an impasse on taxes and healthcare on thursday as they worked on a deal to tame the united states' debt and increase its borrowing limit.
document.title: impasse over taxes, health in debt talks
lines_and_colors: vice president joe biden and top lawmakers faced an impasse on taxes and healthcare on thursday as they worked on a deal to tame the united states' debt and increase its borrowing limit.
